keyMoments.title: Luffy Accepts Fukaboshi's Request
keyMoments.description: Luffy accepts Fukaboshi's request to reset Fish-Man Island's history to zero, establishing a formal alliance.
keyMoments.significance: The Straw Hats officially become allies of Fish-Man Island and the Ryugu Kingdom.

keyMoments.title: Declaration of Friendship with Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: Luffy declares to all of Fish-Man Island that they are friends and the Straw Hats will protect them.
keyMoments.significance: Publicly announces the alliance and the crew's commitment to the island.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Origins of the Officers' Hatred Revealed
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals how the future officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates absorbed anti-human propaganda as children in the Fish-Man District.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the crew's ideology was formed through environmental indoctrination rather than personal experience.

keyMoments.title: Officers Celebrate Otohime's Death
keyMoments.description: Flashback shows the future officers celebrating Queen Otohime's assassination, revealing the depth of their twisted ideology.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how far their hatred extends, even to celebrating the murder of their own queen.

jollyRoger.description: A fish-man skull with crossed bones

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi's 'Reset to Zero' Speech
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi, representing the Neptune Family, makes an emotional plea to Luffy to reset Fish-Man Island's history to zero.
keyMoments.significance: The royal family seeks the Straw Hats' help to break the cycle of hatred on their island.

jollyRoger.description: Royal crest of the Ryugu Kingdom
